Name: The Legend of HyperStar
About the game: The Legend of HyperStar is a roguelike,Darksoul like indiegame. Game features Play a well-trained, beautiful and powerful brave girl, challenge various levels. Through the fantastic forest, the secret place. Every time I fail to challenge, I will accumulate wealth and experience to improve myself in my reincarnation. Get more powerful props, strengthen runes and skills, and get better weapons and equipment in random events. Finally defeat all kinds of enemies. Challenge the powerful devil.
